metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000115 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Mercurial prior to version 4.3 is vulnerable to a missing symlink checkthat can malicious repositories to modify files outside the repository

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
mercurial-common - 3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.3-1ubuntu1.1').
